name: Shadow's Crypt
description:
Story

On one day, one boy was walking alone. He was so sad (e.g. breakup, death of some friend/family member), that he doesn’t know where he is going. He was just walking and walking and reached somewhere he doesn’t know the road. The road was so calm and there were trees on both side of the roads, that made the road more scary. But the boy heard some girl was shouting for help from nearby. He followed the sound and he saw that some girl was trying to break the door and shouting for help as well. So he went to the girl and asks about what happened. Then girl replied that her friend went inside for doing something and now he/she is trapped inside and she didn’t heard anything from him/her. Then she asked for that Boy’s help. Boy agrees to help and they both tried to break the door (From outside it looked like some house , but it isn’t) and they succeded. But as soon as they entered the house, the door closed automatically. And the boy one ghost flying around. He got scared and fainted. After some time he wokes up and recognize that he was in dungeon and the girl that he was helping is also missing. He looked behind but there was no door and then he found some snippets.

Controlls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact
